testcase.name: Clicking the top button should scroll to the top of the page
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Clicking the top button should scroll to the top of the page Given The website "http://127.0.0.1:5000" is open ... passed in 0.470s When I click on the "movie" from the homepage ... passed in 1.105s And I click on the "top button" in info page ... passed in 0.084s Then I should be scrolled to the top of the page ... passed in 0.010s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Clicking on the logo navigates to the About Me page
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Clicking on the logo navigates to the About Me page Given Open the site "http://127.0.0.1:5000" ... passed in 0.224s When I click on the logo "about" from homepage up the page ... passed in 0.111s Then I am taken to the About Me page ... passed in 0.005s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: Clicking on the logo image should navigate to the home page
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario: Clicking on the logo image should navigate to the home page Given The site "http://127.0.0.1:5000" is open ... passed in 0.174s When The user clicks on the "movie" image ... passed in 0.643s And The user clicks on the "logo homepage" ... passed in 0.302s Then The user should be navigated to the home page ... passed in 0.006s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: User enters incorrect login credentials -- @1.1
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: User enters incorrect login credentials -- @1.1 Given The user is on the page url "http://127.0.0.1:5000" ... passed in 0.172s Then Click on "login" ... passed in 0.162s When The user enters aya and password ... passed in 0.140s And The user clicks the "login button" ... passed in 0.125s Then The user should see an indication of login incorrect ... passed in 0.000s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: User enters correct login credentials -- @1.2
testcase.system-out:
@scenario.begin Scenario Outline: User enters correct login credentials -- @1.2 Given The user is on the page url "http://127.0.0.1:5000" ... passed in 0.267s Then Click on "login" ... passed in 0.066s When The user enters aya and 123 ... passed in 0.154s And The user clicks the "login button" ... passed in 0.140s Then The user should see an indication of login correct ... passed in 0.004s
@scenario.end --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
